trans-unit.source: Represents a designer verb that creates a template editing frame, and that can be invoked only by a template editor.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个设计器谓词，该谓词创建模板编辑框并且只能由模板编辑器调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb> class is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb>类已过时。

trans-unit.source: Expose templates through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> property of a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 公开通过模板<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>的控件设计器的属性。

trans-unit.source: The design host creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedEditableDesignerRegion> for each <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> defined for a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 设计宿主创建<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedEditableDesignerRegion>每个<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>为控件设计器定义。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb" /> 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: The text to show for the verb on a menu.
trans-unit.target: 要为菜单上的谓词显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: An optional integer value that can be used by a designer, typically to indicate the index of the verb within a set of verbs.
trans-unit.target: 可由设计器使用的可选整数值，通常指示谓词在谓词集中的索引。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb" /> class with the specified verb text and index.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的谓词文本和索引初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb> class is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb>类已过时。

trans-unit.source: Expose templates through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> property of a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 公开通过模板<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>的控件设计器的属性。

trans-unit.source: The design host creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedEditableDesignerRegion> for each <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> defined for a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 设计宿主创建<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedEditableDesignerRegion>每个<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>为控件设计器定义。

trans-unit.source: The text to show for the verb on a menu.
trans-unit.target: 要为菜单上的谓词显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: An optional integer value that can be used by a designer, typically to indicate the index of the verb within a set of verbs.
trans-unit.target: 可由设计器使用的可选整数值，通常指示谓词在谓词集中的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner" /> that can use this verb.
trans-unit.target: 可使用此谓词的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb> class is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb>类已过时。

trans-unit.source: Expose templates through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> property of a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 公开通过模板<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>的控件设计器的属性。

trans-unit.source: The design host creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedEditableDesignerRegion> for each <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> defined for a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 设计宿主创建<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedEditableDesignerRegion>每个<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>为控件设计器定义。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb" />.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb" /> 使用的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb" />.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb" /> 使用的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb.Dispose%2A> allows the resources used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb> to be reallocated for other purposes.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb.Dispose%2A>允许使用的资源<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb>可以重新分配用于其他目的。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb> class is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb>类已过时。

trans-unit.source: Expose templates through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> property of a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 公开通过模板<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>的控件设计器的属性。

trans-unit.source: The design host creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedEditableDesignerRegion> for each <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> defined for a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 设计宿主创建<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedEditableDesignerRegion>每个<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>为控件设计器定义。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 <see langword="true" />；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb" /> 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共`Dispose`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with `disposing` set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: When `disposing` is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb> references.
trans-unit.target: 当`disposing`是`true`，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb>引用。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb" /> class is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb" />类已过时。

trans-unit.source: Expose templates through the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups" /> property of a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 公开通过模板<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups" />的控件设计器的属性。

trans-unit.source: The design host creates a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedEditableDesignerRegion" /> for each <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup" /> defined for a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 设计宿主创建<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedEditableDesignerRegion" />每个<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup" />为控件设计器定义。

trans-unit.source: </para> </block> <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: </para> </block> <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以多次调用由其他对象。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 重写 <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 <see langword="Dispose" /> 时已释放的对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何实现详细信息<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to free resources before the object is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 在垃圾回收将对象回收之前，尝试释放资源。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and cleans up resources by calling `Dispose(false)`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将替代<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>并清理资源通过调用`Dispose(false)`。

trans-unit.source: Override `Dispose(Boolean)` to customize the cleanup.
trans-unit.target: 重写 `Dispose(Boolean)` 以自定义清理。

trans-unit.source: Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序代码不应调用此方法。对象的`Finalize`方法过程中将自动调用垃圾回收，除非已通过调用禁用垃圾回收器的终止<xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[Finalize 方法和析构函数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70)，[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)，和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb> class is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb>类已过时。

trans-unit.source: Expose templates through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> property of a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 公开通过模板<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>的控件设计器的属性。

trans-unit.source: The design host creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedEditableDesignerRegion> for each <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> defined for a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 设计宿主创建<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedEditableDesignerRegion>每个<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>为控件设计器定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index or other user data for the verb.
trans-unit.target: 获取该谓词的索引或其他用户数据。

trans-unit.source: The index or user data for the verb.
trans-unit.target: 该谓词的索引或用户数据。

trans-unit.source: This property is sometimes used to store the index of each verb in a set of verbs.
trans-unit.target: 有时，此属性用于将每个谓词的索引存储在一组谓词。

trans-unit.source: When implementing a custom designer, this property can be used to store custom-defined integer data.
trans-unit.target: 在实现自定义设计器时，此属性可以用于存储自定义整数数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb> class is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb>类已过时。

trans-unit.target: 公开通过模板<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>的控件设计器的属性。

trans-unit.source: The design host creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedEditableDesignerRegion> for each <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> defined for a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 设计宿主创建<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedEditableDesignerRegion>每个<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>为控件设计器定义。
